about_the_game:
About the game:.
Since ancient times there have been legends of an underwater civilization hidden from human eyes in the abyss of the ocean. The stories would have remained legends, until the network of fishermen did not get a strange artifact, indicating that we are not the only intelligent beings on the planet.

Scientists all over the world became interested in this discovery, patrons and corporations from different countries began to collect expeditions to the depths of the ocean. But no expedition has ever returned from a dive.

From the depths only came signals for help...The Signal of the Abyss....

The Great Underwater World.
What mysteries does the ocean hold? Huge rocks, silt deposits, plenty of vegetation, and cold water all around. And all this is teeming with life. Dive into the depths of the ocean in a submarine and explore the mysteries!

Animal life.
Many species of fish, underwater monsters. Maybe there is a place for intelligent creatures?

Cooperative Play.
Become part of an expedition together with your friends. Control the units on the submarine to dive further into the depths.

content_descriptors.notes: In the game you have to descend in a tense atmosphere in a submarine into the depths of the ocean.
